text: Ezɨ kɨ ia mɨgei, Elaija izegha gɨfa. Ezɨ gumazamiziba akɨnafarimɨn osizirir an gun mɨkemezimɨn mɨrara, me uan arazir me ifongezibar a gami.” (9:13) Dughiar kamɨn Iesus Elaija izamin bizim mɨgei, egha guizbangɨra Jon, Gumaziba ruer gumazim mɨgei. Nɨ foghsɨ, Matyu 17:12ɨn gan. Jon izava Iesus izasava a bagha tuavibar akɨra faragha ize.
